title: Personal Protfolio
description: A personal portfolio website to showcase my projects and skills. An opportunity to learn Svelte and Tailwind.

title: Infofest 2023
description: Website for a National level tech event organized by the DCST Students of Goa University.

title: Task Master
description: A simple Kanban board to manage tasks and collaborate in teams.

title: Frontend Challenges
description: A collection of frontend challenges to help improve my skills in building ui.

title: SpeedWaGoan
description: An e-commerce web application. Features include Responsive UI, Cart, Wishlist, Search/Filter Products. Also includes Admin and Seller Applications.

title: myExpenses
description: An easy to use expense tracker. Originally built in PHP for a intra-college competition where it won the 2nd prize and later rebuilt in React.

title: Room Based Chat App
description: A Room-based Chat website developed for a college assignment. It includes public rooms where people can chat and have discussions.

title: TPortal
description: A is a video dispenser that is designed for parents to provide controlled access to offline video media content to their children.

title: Quick Access
description: An app to store bookmarks/favourite sites in one place and access from anywhere with preferences synced across devices.
